title: .gustafson
author: .gustafson
content: FRWT Wallet is a multifunctional, non-custodial Web3 cryptocurrency wallet. With this app, you can safely store, send, receive, stake, and swap hundreds of cryptocurrencies based on 15 blockchains. FRWT has on-ramps, so if you want to purchase crypto, you can do it right within the wallet. The app is available for Android devices. Also, you can install it as a browser extension.The app was developed by an experienced team. Unlike the predecessor of the same name, FRWT is a non-custodial wallet, meaning that only you own your private keys. The new app is easy to use and is full of features.What you can do with FRWT:– Buy crypto with fiat money. FRWT supports multiple payment avenues, including Visa, Mastercard, GooglePay, and more.– Store and manage over 1000 tokens based on 15 blockchains. On top of it, you can add custom blockchains to elevate flexibility. – Swap tokens instantly. You won't have to register on exchanges and trade crypto. Just input the cryptos you want to swap, insert the amount, and tap on Swap!– Access NFT marketplaces. FRWT allows storing, sending, and receiving non-fungible tokens.– Don't pay anything on top of blockchain fees for transactions.– Monitor the crypto market. You can access a customizable news feed directly in the app.– Track your crypto portfolio. FRWT automatically calculates the total value of your crypto assets in a currency of choice.Security FirstFRWT provides a multi-layered protection to your account. As the wallet doesn't hold your private keys, your funds are safe if your keys are not accessible to others. Keeping the seed phrase is crucial, too.To ensure the safety of your account, FRWT uses AES-256 encryption of all data and multiple tools and protocols to test the system. The program code undergoes regular audits to find and fix potential vulnerabilities.How to Get Started?1. Download and install an app.2. Sign up using your email address.3. Confirm the registration via email.4. You're done!Please note that in some cases, you can be asked to undergo a KYC verification. For more information, please visit the official FRWT Wallet website.

comments.author: aliveNFT
comments.created_time: December 11, 2023, 01:20:22 PMLast edit: December 11, 2023, 01:31:13 PM by aliveNFT
comments.body: Hello !why all download buttons (app/extension) are not clickable QuotePlease note that in some cases, you can be asked to undergo a KYC verification.What are the specific cases? Like AML?QuoteBuy crypto with fiat money. FRWT supports multiple payment avenues, including Visa, Mastercard, GooglePay, and more.QuoteSwap tokens instantly. You won't have to register on exchanges and trade cryptoDo you use Changelly for this? I have a very bad history with them, you understand that they can request KYC or just arrange a problem out of the blue, but since you are the conductor, you will solve this problem.

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: Quote from: .gustafson on December 11, 2023, 01:19:18 PMThe app was developed by an experienced team. Unlike the predecessor of the same name, FRWT is a non-custodial wallet, meaning that only you own your private keys. The new app is easy to use and is full of features.Please note that in some cases, you can be asked to undergo a KYC verification. These two sentences are contradictions. You cannot say that the service is non-custodial wallet and then say that you can be asked to undergo a KYC verification. This means that the service is custodial wallet and that the code is closed source and that you can access the private key and freeze the client’s funds if he does not complete the identity verification or on At least there is a custodial service and a non-custodial service.I did not find the download links and I do not think the code is open source.There is no reason to use a closed source wallet, so it is better for the service to be a DEX and CEX exchange

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Quote from: .gustafson on December 11, 2023, 01:19:18 PMThe app is available for Android devices. Also, you can install it as a browser extension.Not sure why you advertised the service yet the app and extension are not yet availableQuoteTo ensure the safety of your account, FRWT uses AES-256 encryption of all data and multiple tools and protocols to test the system. The program code undergoes regular audits to find and fix potential vulnerabilities.It would have been much better if it was open source. How do we know that the code undergoes regular audits?Quote from: .gustafson on December 11, 2023, 01:19:18 PM[...]2. Sign up using your email address.3. Confirm the registration via email.[...]A noncustodial wallet, but then it requires someone to sign up? What exactly is the point then?

comments.author: stafstor
comments.body: Be careful!FRWT is nothing more, just another name of Freewallet org.https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1964190.0https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=4436226.0https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5462119.0https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5460649.0Check real reviews before downloading this app!They may block your assets anytime. This is called KYC scam!

comments.author: stafstor
comments.body: Judging by the low activity on the Internet and on this forum in particular in topics dedicated to FRWT, this application was not able to gather enough customers. And this is certainly good, because FRWT is the same scam as its “ancestor”, Freewallet.But despite this, I want to warn everyone, if you have installed this application, delete it and do not deposit coins. If you have already deposited it, try to withdraw it. Otherwise, today or in a month the administration may simply block your account!
